Code classification for Comorbidity

dxComorbid.Rd

The comorbidities classification (AHRQ, Charlson ,and Elixhauser Comorbidity) for ICD diagnostic codes is a diagnostic categorization scheme that can employ in many types of projects analyzing data on diagnoses.

icdDxToComorbid(dxDataFile, idColName, icdColName, dateColName,
  icdVerColName = NULL, icd10usingDate = NULL, comorbidMethod,
  isDescription = FALSE)

Arguments

dxDataFile

A file of clinical diagnostic data with at least 3 columns: "Member ID", "ICD", and "Date"
idColName

Column name for Member ID of dxDataFile
icdColName

Column name for ICD of dxDataFile
dateColName

Column name for Date of dxDataFile
icdVerColName

Column name for ICD Version used of dxDataFile. ICD version should be recorded as "9" or "10". If this argument is provided, then icd10usingDate is not needed.
icd10usingDate

The date that ICD-10 was started using
comorbidMethod

Three comorbidity methods: AHRQ, Charlson and Elixhauser Comorbidity. Change it to any of the other possible variables (ahrq,charlson, and elix).
isDescription

Category or description of standard classification methods for ICD diagnostic codes. By default it is set to FALSE ( Comorbidity categories).

Value

Three new data.tables. 1) groupedDT: Based on dxDataFile with two new columns for uniform format diagnostic codes and classified standard categories. 2) summarised_groupedDT: Summarized the dataset groupedDT and sorted by member ID. 3) Error: Potential error codes from dxUniform.

Details

Collapse ICD codes into a smaller number of clinically meaningful categories that are more useful for presenting descriptive statistics than are individual ICD diagnostic codes.

See also

Other code classification functions: dxPheWAS, dxCustom, dxCCS

Examples

# sample file for example

head(sampleDxFile)
#>     ID  ICD       Date
#> 1:  A2 Z992 2020-05-22
#> 2:  A5 Z992 2020-01-24
#> 3:  A8 Z992 2015-10-27
#> 4: A13 Z992 2020-04-26
#> 5: A13 Z992 2025-02-02
#> 6: A15 Z992 2023-05-12

# Group diagnostic codes into charlson comorbidity categories

icdDxToComorbid(dxDataFile = sampleDxFile, idColName = ID, icdColName = ICD, dateColName = Date, icdVerColName = NULL, icd10usingDate = "2015/10/01", comorbidMethod = charlson, isDescription = FALSE)
#> Wrong ICD format: total 9 ICD codes (the number of occurrences is in brackets)
#> c("A0.11 (20)", "E114 (8)", "Z9.90 (6)", "F42 (6)", "001 (5)", "75.52 (4)", "755.2 (3)", "123.45 (3)", "7552 (2)")
#> 	
#> Wrong ICD version: total 7 ICD codes (the number of occurrences is in brackets)
#> c("V27.0 (18)", "A01.05 (8)", "42761 (7)", "V24.1 (6)", "A0105 (5)", "E03.0 (4)", "650 (4)")
#> 	
#> Warning: The ICD mentioned above matches to "NA" due to the format or other issues.
#> Warning: "Wrong ICD format" means the ICD has wrong format
#> Warning: "Wrong ICD version" means the ICD classify to wrong ICD version (cause the "icd10usingDate" or other issues)
#> $groupedDT
#>       Short  ID    ICD       Date Comorbidity
#>   1:   Z992  A2   Z992 2020-05-22          RD
#>   2:   Z992  A5   Z992 2020-01-24          RD
#>   3:   Z992  A8   Z992 2015-10-27          RD
#>   4:   Z992 A13   Z992 2020-04-26          RD
#>   5:   Z992 A13   Z992 2025-02-02          RD
#>  ---                                         
#> 296:    650  C2    650 2017-10-10        <NA>
#> 297:    650  D4    650 2022-04-04        <NA>
#> 298: 123.45  C3 123.45 2022-09-28        <NA>
#> 299: 123.45  D8 123.45 2018-06-17        <NA>
#> 300: 123.45  C0 123.45 2017-05-09        <NA>
#> 
#> $summarised_groupedDT
#>      ID Comorbidity firstCaseDate endCaseDate count    period

# Group diagnostic codes into ahrq comorbidity categories

icdDxToComorbid(dxDataFile = sampleDxFile, idColName = ID, icdColName = ICD, dateColName = Date, icdVerColName = NULL, icd10usingDate = "2015/10/01", comorbidMethod = ahrq, isDescription = TRUE)
#> Wrong ICD format: total 9 ICD codes (the number of occurrences is in brackets)
#> c("A0.11 (20)", "E114 (8)", "Z9.90 (6)", "F42 (6)", "001 (5)", "75.52 (4)", "755.2 (3)", "123.45 (3)", "7552 (2)")
#> 	
#> Wrong ICD version: total 7 ICD codes (the number of occurrences is in brackets)
#> c("V27.0 (18)", "A01.05 (8)", "42761 (7)", "V24.1 (6)", "A0105 (5)", "E03.0 (4)", "650 (4)")
#> 	
#> Warning: The ICD mentioned above matches to "NA" due to the format or other issues.
#> Warning: "Wrong ICD format" means the ICD has wrong format
#> Warning: "Wrong ICD version" means the ICD classify to wrong ICD version (cause the "icd10usingDate" or other issues)
#> $groupedDT
#>       Short  ID    ICD       Date   Description
#>   1:   Z992  A2   Z992 2020-05-22 Renal failure
